artwork.creator: Tesai Hokuba
artwork.title: Five Beauties
artwork.medium: hanging scroll; ink and color on silk
artwork.subject: Women
artwork.label: The two women on the left play a hand-gesture game called kitsune-ken (fox fists) in which gestures representing a supernatural fox (kitsune) defeat those of a village head (shōya), who defeats a hunter (ryōshi), who in turn defeats the fox. An apprentice courtesan serves tea while a high-ranking courtesan makes a grand entrance. A feast of sashimi and other delicacies sits nearby. (The Met)
